data.text: @LuckySimba777 @Saikmedi @FreeBeYouMe @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG Yes, I plan to get my son vaccinated.
@Saikmedi @KrugAlli @FreeBeYouMe @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG Bacterial meningitis. You have a small window to not be permanently disabled or dead.

@Saikmedi @KrugAlli @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG I am totally seeing that happen. The whole narrative of VACCINES as a pro or anti concept is so dumb, because each formulation is its own entity, with its own specific indications and risks.

@KrugAlli @FreeBeYouMe @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG Meningococcus is ⬆️ infectious to where prophylaxis is recommended to  exposed. Though mortality is “only” 6% (high AF) the resulting neurological sequelae of the disease is often permanent. This is what I feared: push covid vaccine too hard, public loses trust in other vaccines.

@hutton112329 @thomasmidleton @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG We need to see the data so we can help develop strategic interventions that DO work. Need to know age, vax status, comorbidities, linkage to outpatient testing and care. Transparency is important, @GovKathyHochul 

I want to help you do what works, and stop what doesn't.
@KrugAlli @thomasmidleton @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG I cannot find any further info on any SUNY covid deaths.

@thomasmidleton @hutton112329 @GovKathyHochul @AaronSiriSG @GovKathyHochul 

Zero covid hospitalizations among students in the system. 👇👇

Boosters cannot reduce zero any further. 

(However, 10 student fatalities? "with" covid? If no hospitalizations, did the student expire of other causes?)
